thread.title: Brotherhood businessman Hassan Malek arrested
thread.title_full: Brotherhood businessman Hassan Malek arrested - Politics - Egypt - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Brotherhood businessman Hassan Malek arrested
text:
Muslm Brotherhood businessman Hassan Malek was arrested from his house in New Cairo's Fifth Settlement on Thursday evening, a security source told Al-Ahram Arabic news website.
It is unclear what charges Malek was arrested on. His family posted the news of his arrest on his daughter's Facebook page.
Malekâ€™s son, Omar, was handed down a life sentence last April on charges of setting up an "operation room" at the protest camp that supported ousted president Mohamed Morsi in Cairo's Rabaa Al-Adawiya area in 2013, among other charges.
The group has been ruled a terrorist organisation. Its leading figures including its Supreme Guide Mohamed Badie have since been arrested and put on trial on various charges.
